flawed_nl_solution:
Ryan read an average of 300 pages a day because 2100 / 7 = <<2100/7=300>>300
He read 10 more pages a day on average than his brother because 300 - 200 = <<300-200=10>>10
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 10. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
